notFound.title: Recipe Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Oops! Looks like this page went off the menu.
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Let's get you back to cooking delicious meals!

wakeWord.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access and try again.
wakeWord.noMicrophone: No microphone found. Please connect a microphone and try again.
wakeWord.onnxLoadFailed: Failed to load ONNX Runtime. This might be due to: (1) No internet connection to load WASM files from CDN, or (2) Browser restrictions. Try refreshing the page or check your internet connection.

wakeWord.modelLoadFailed: Failed to load wake word model. Make sure wakeword_model.onnx is in the public folder...
wakeWord.wasmFailed: WebAssembly loading failed. Please refresh the page...
